title: B Site Default Post Plant Lineup from B Main

title: Standard A Site Sky Smoke Placements
description: Here are the default smokes for an A Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.

title: A Site Default Post Plant from A Lobby
description: Use this post plant from A Lobby to safely delay or deny the Defenders from defusing the spike on A Site Default.

title: Hold B Tower and B Main Like This
description: Use your Sky Smokes and Incendiaries to hold down important chokepoints into B Site and B Tower by using the different variations shown in this video.

title: Hold A Main and Tower Like This
description: Use your Sky Smokes and Incendiaries to hold down important chokepoints into A Site and A Tower by using the different variations shown in this video.

title: Aggressive Catwalk Push Sky Smokes
description: Use these Sky Smokes to take space in mid, push up Catwalk, and either pressure or push into A Site through Tree with your team.

title: B Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary
description: Use this Sky Smoke + Incendiary setup to delay people from pushing through the B Main chokepoint into B Site.

title: A Nest To Close Left Side Corner On A Site Incendiary
description: This Incendiary lineup is useful for clearing the close left corner on A Site.

title: A Nest To A Site Default Incendiary
description: This Incendiary lineup is useful for stopping players from defusing the spike when planted on default of A Site.

title: B Green One Way Skysmoke + Incendiary Delay Setup
description: Here is a simple and effective setup to delay / disrupt the Attackers push into B Site.

title: A Rafters to A Site Incendiary
description: This Incendiary lineup is useful for stopping players on the attacking side from pushing too aggressively onto A Site and will also prevent players from taking the A Site ult orb.

title: A Site Default Sky Smokes
description: A good set of Sky Smokes to take control of A Site.

title: Mid Cannon to Front B Site Incendiary
description: This is a good Incendiary for post plant on A Site from Mid Cannon.

title: A Lobby to A Right Pyramid Incendiary
description: This is a good incendiary grenade for A Right Pyramid to stop the defuse of a bomb.

title: Mid Nest to Elbow Sky Smoke
description: A good Sky Smoke to hold against an Elbow lurk.

title: Simple A Site Post Plant from A Main
description: Here's a simple, but effective post plant lineup from A Main for the open corner in lower A Site.

title: Simple B Boxes Post Plant Lineup from B Tower
description: Here's a simple, but effective post plant lineup from B Tower.

title: Standard A Site Execute Sky Smokes for Rope, Rafter, and Spawn

title: Standard B Site Execute Sky Smokes for Generator and Canteen

title: Post Plant Lineup for Jump Up Corner on B Site from B Tower
description: Here's a great post plant molly lineup for the Jump Up Corner on B Site, from B Tower.

title: B Tree To B Site Boxes Post Plant Molly
description: Here's a great post plant molly from from B Tree to B Site boxes in the B Site spike plant zone.

title: A Site Hold / Delay Sky Smoke from B Site
description: Here's a simple, but effective way to assist your teammates on A Site in delaying the Attackers from pushing onto A, when you are playing from Generator on B Site.

title: A Site Retake Smokes
description: Here are two effective smokes either on their own or combo'd with each other, depending on the situation, that are essential to know if you want to effectively retake A Site, alongside a simple Incendiary linup that you can use to prevent enemy players from pushing out of A Main to help their teammates on A Site.

title: B Site Positioning to Both Delay B Main Push, and Support A Site
description: Here's a great way to set yourself up on B Site, to not only be able to delay the B Main push, but also to support your teammates on A Site with a delay Smoke if needed.

title: B Club to B Site Post Plant Incendiary
description: This is a good Incendiary to delay enemies from defusing the spike after you've planted it.

title: B Ramp to B Site Post Plant Incendiary
description: This is a good post plant Incendiary for B Site to delay enemies from defusing your spike.

title: B Site Default Smokes
description: These are the default smokes for B Site that you can use to cut off all access points into the site allowing your team to take the site and get the Spike down.

title: A Site Default Smokes
description: These are the default smokes for A Site that you can use to cut off all access points into the site allowing your team to take the site and get the Spike down.

title: A Main to A Site Post Plant Incendiary
description: This is an easy post plant setup that will allow you to play time and shoot your incendiary stopping the enemy team from defusing the spike.
